Tanks

类 TerrainPixelLine

  • java.lang.Object
    • Tanks.TerrainPixelLine

  • public class TerrainPixelLine
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a single line of terrain pixels.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      TerrainPixelLine(int x, float colHeight, int[] terrainRGB)
      Constructs a TerrainPixelLine object.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • TerrainPixelLine

        public TerrainPixelLine(int x,
                        float colHeight,
                        int[] terrainRGB)
        Constructs a TerrainPixelLine object.
        参数:
        x - the x-coordinate of the line
        colHeight - the height of the line
        terrainRGB - the RGB values of the line's color
